doc:
Paul Campbell (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Campbell_(American_actor) 0 Paul Campbell (February 27, 1923 – March 17, 1999), was an American film actor. He appeared in over 30 films between 1947 and 1959. Campbell was best known for his work at Columbia Pictures, where he usually portrayed tall, handsome leading men of the western genre. Modern viewers will recognize him as Clarence Cassidy, the cowardly cowboy in The Three Stooges film Merry Mavericks. Campbell died on March 17, 1999 in New York City. Paul_Campbell ( February_27_,_1923 – March_17_,_1999 ) , was an_American_film_actor . He appeared in over_30_films between 1947_and_1959 . Campbell was_best_known for his_work at Columbia_Pictures , where he usually portrayed tall_,_handsome_leading_men of the_western_genre . Modern_viewers will_recognize him as Clarence_Cassidy , the_cowardly_cowboy in The_Three_Stooges_film_Merry_Mavericks . Campbell died on March_17_,_1999 in New_York_City .
